question: Could you please give me infotmation about these 5 auliya ,Sheikh Yusuf ,Sheikh Motura ,Sheikh Noorul Mobeen who are buried in Cape Town
answer:
QUESTION
Could you please give me infotmation about these 5 auliya ,Sheikh Yusuf ,Sheikh Motura ,Sheikh Noorul Mobeen who are buried in Cape Town ,also on Sheikh Badsha Peer and Soofie Sahab who are buried in Durban.i would like to know what miracles they could perform.Jazakaalh
ANSWER
